item.title: Workshop
item.description: ECS Workshop using Mu Introduction The goal is to educate developers that are unfamiliar with Fargate, ECS, and possibly even container workflow, and get them up to speed quickly and easily by building a typical devops CI/CD pipeline. I want to reduce the learning curve as much as possible, but still do things in a normal AWS sort of way. When I ran across Mu (getmu.io) I really liked their opinionated, clean approach to building these pipelines.
